amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds made available under this Act in a manner that would increase wait times for veterans who seek care at medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2992 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2992 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4336) To prohibit the use of funds made available under this Act in a manner that would increase wait times for veterans who seek care at medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2992 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2992 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2910.
